title: Game Freezing after Loading Screen
body: Ever since the Anniversary Update for Windows 10 my game has started to freeze after loading screen.  Once loading screen is done and I pop into the game my computer completely freezes.  This never happened to me until after the Anniversary Update for Windows 10.  It has happened to me for normal games and custom games.  I have no idea how to fix this problem.

replies.body: I just did what the rioter told me to do and it fixed my problem . Can I get leaver buster taken off my account pls T_T i've had the freeze thing happen to me for 2 days

You should be able to fix this by disabling the [Xbox Game bar.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) I've seen this issue for well over a week or two now, and it seems that the Anniversary update enabled the Game DVR feature in the game bar, which causes complete PC freezes or low capped FPS for some players.

Let me know if you have any questions.
